German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From be- +‎ deuten.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /bəˈdɔɪ̯tn̩/, /bəˈdɔɪ̯tən/
  • Audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

bedeuten (third-person singular simple present bedeutet, past tense bedeutete, past participle bedeutet, auxiliary haben)

  1. to mean, to signify
